description: The planet was named after the explorer that discovered it: Derek Faweetley.
The planet is primarily made of jungle. There is no known inhabitant beside animals and plants.
An old supply depot was used by Brewinger, a loyal member of the EdG criminal syndicate.
After the encounter with the PCs, Brewinger had to move his operation somewhere else as the site became too hot.
Jakuta III is in the system Jakuta and is the host of a lot of volcanos.
An old abandoned Rebel Propaganda Broadcast Facility was present on the planet and was taken over by pirates.
System where a battle happened between the Empire and the Rebels, over a rebel base.
